pages.text: $(li)The Lectern is a block that is capable to hold readable books, like the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/book_and_quill)Book and Quill$(/l) or the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/getting_started)Endernomicon$(/l).$(br)$(li)Just right click on the lectern while you are holding a written book on your hand.
$(li)Once placed, you will be able to read the book right clicking on the Lectern again.
